name: Shakib Al Hasan
review: My first love is CA cricket bat. Couple of years I played by CA 8000 Cricket Bat. One of the most powerful willows in recent world it's CA Cricket BAT.

name: Tamim Iqbal
review: From start to now, I am still with my favorite brand CA. That CA 10000 Cricket Bat is the real example of my centuries. I feel really safe when I am hitting big sixes. Really I love it

name: Imam Ul Haq
review: I started my career with this brand and still I am with it. CA is not only a company, but also our hope. I love to play with this willow. Love you CA.

name: Fakhar Zaman
review: When I was getting an amazing century against India in CWC final, after that I fall in CA's love. It's not a company, it's our hope. I love it so much because it's my local brand. It's my pride. Love to stay with this strong brand.

name: Kieron Pollard
review: As a Jamaican sportsman, we used to play cricket with those kinds of brand which brand willow helps us to hit long sixes. Because we all love to enjoy our cricket. I really love to play with CA bats. that willow is really strong enough.

name: Eoin Morgan
review: As a English cricketer, I love to choose best willows all over the world. I played with lots of bats in my career. Among them, I love to use that CA willow. That gives me more confidence to hit up in the air. Really love it.

name: Evin Lewis
review: I love to play with CA willow. It's really great and have a good balance in it. For long power hitting I recommended to use CA Cricket Bats.

name: TM Dilshan
review: More than an era, I am with CA sports. They are really good with sportsmen. I love to play with this willow and I strongly suggest to play as a hard-hitter with this bat.

name: Shoaib Malik
review: More then 10 years, I am with CA company. It's now a part of our life. I recommended to the young stars to play with this willow. My country brand, my proud. CA Cricket

name: Misbah-Ul-Haq
review: CA willow is not only for power hitting but also as a defensive cricket. I realize that in test matches. Love you CA.
